posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have for sale a nice T207 Chief Bender in a PSA 4 holder. This is a very nice card. You will be pleased with this card.

I am asking $190 for the card. I prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order. But if that is a problem, I will accept PayPal.

If you would like to buy it, you can contact me at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t207/picsb/07-011b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t207/picsb/07-011rb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
